A user-defined description of the conten.other: A user-defined description of the content of this workspace

API endpoint - Used to launch the window.other: API endpoint - Used to launch the window allowing the user to authenticate and accept the terms of the app

API endpoint - Used to refresh or valida.other: API endpoint - Used to refresh or validate the token retrieved in the authentication part

API setting - Redirect URL for the OAuth.other: API setting - Redirect URL for the OAuth Application

Absolute path to the public folder where.other: Absolute path to the public folder where temporary download links will be created. This is used for legacy purpose, newly created links do not use it anymore, but use the Base URI instead.

Administrator email, not used for the mo.other: Administrator email, not used for the moment

Alias for replacing the generated unique.other: Alias for replacing the generated unique id of the workspace

Allow group administrators to create a r.other: Allow group administrators to create a repository from this template.

Allow non-admin users to create a reposi.other: Allow non-admin users to create a workspace from this template.

Allow the users to pick an existing user.other: Allow the users to pick an existing user when sharing a folder

Big Icon for representing the template.other: Big Icon for representing the template

Comma separated list of metastore and me.other: Comma separated list of metastore and meta plugins, that will be automatically applied to all workspaces created with this driver

Comma-separated list of extensions to hi.other: Comma-separated list of extensions to hide. Extensions, files and folders that are hidden are also access forbidden.

Comma-separated list of specific files t.other: Comma-separated list of specific files to hide

Comma-separated list of specific folders.other: Comma-separated list of specific folders to hide

Common URI to access the shares. Please.other: Common URI to access the shares. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.

Default language when a user does not ha.other: Default language when a user does not have set his/her own.

Default realm for authentication. Please.other: Default realm for authentication. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.

Delegates download operations to an alte.other: Delegates download operations to an alternative agent, either webserver or Pydio agent. Warning, this requires external modules to be installed. When using XSendFile/XaccelRedirect, you have to manually add the folders where files will be downloaded in the module configuration

Disable Zip files inline browsing. This.other: Disable Zip files inline browsing. This can be necessary if you always store huge zip archives: it can have some impact on performance.

Display the list of files and folder whe.other: Display the list of files and folder when accessing through the browser

Enable WebDAV for all users by default..other: Enable WebDAV for all users by default. If set to false, users will have to manually enable WebDAV via their preferences panel.

Enable the webDAV support. Please READ T.other: Enable the webDAV support. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.

Explicitly disable WebDAV access for thi.other: Explicitly disable WebDAV access for this repository.

For exotic auth drivers, an user ID that.other: For exotic auth drivers, an user ID that must be considered as admin by default.

For multiple authentication, apply this.other: For multiple authentication, apply this role to users authenticated via this driver

Force remote sorting when in paginated m.other: Force remote sorting when in paginated mode. Warning, this can impact the performances.

Gzip files on-the-fly before downloading.other: Gzip files on-the-fly before downloading. Disabled by default, as it's generally useful only on small files, and decreases performances on big files. This has nothing to see with the Zip Creation feature, it's just a on-the-fly compression applied on a unique file at download.

Host used in webDAV protocol. Should be.other: Host used in webDAV protocol. Should be detected by default. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.

If activated, a default limit should be.other: If activated, a default limit should be set above when files are no more compressed.

If not inferred directly from the curren.other: If not inferred directly from the current Pydio URL plus the public base URI, replace the public access URL here.

If set to a given URL, the login action.other: If set to a given URL, the login action will not trigger the display of login screen but redirect to this URL.

If you encounter problems with online zi.other: If you encounter problems with online zip creation or multiple files downloading, you can disable the feature.

If you have tons of workspaces (which is.other: If you have tons of workspaces (which is not recommanded), admin users login can take a long time while updating admin access to all repositories. Use this option to disable this step, admin will always have access to the Settings.

If your server does not set correctly it.other: If your server does not set correctly its charset, it can be good to specify it here manually.

Leave empty if you do not want to use a.other: Leave empty if you do not want to use a recycle bin.

Main container for core Pydio settings (.other: Main container for core Pydio settings (application title, sharing, webdav server config, etc...)

Maximum characters length of new files o.other: Maximum characters length of new files or folders

On Windows running IIS, set this option.other: On Windows running IIS, set this option to true if the COM extension is loaded, this may enable the use of the php command line.

On specific hosts, you may have to use a.other: On specific hosts, you may have to use a specific path to access the php command line

Once in pagination mode, number of items.other: Once in pagination mode, number of items to display per page.

Prefilled label for the new repository,.other: Prefilled label for the new workspace, you can use the PYDIO_USER keyworkd in it.

Server URL used to build share links and.other: Server URL used to build share links and notifications. It will be detected if empty.

Set this repository group owner : only u.other: Set this repository group owner : only users of this group will see it

Set up a specific encoding (try IBM850 o.other: Set up a specific encoding (try IBM850 or CP437) for filenames to fix characters problems during Zip creation. This may create OS-incompatible archives (Win/Mac). If you still have issue, you can add //TRANSLIT after the encoding string to force transliteration of unknown characters in your target encoding (example CP437//TRANSLIT).

This authentication mechanism is less se.other: This authentication mechanism is less secure, but will avoid the users having to re-enter a password in some case.

This is necessary only if you have error.other: This is necessary only if you have errors concerning the tmp dir access or writeability : most probably, they are due to PHP SAFE MODE (should disappear in php6) or various OPEN_BASEDIR restrictions. In that case, create and set writeable a tmp folder somewhere at the root of your hosting (but above the web/ or www/ or http/ if possible!!) and enter here the full path to this folder

This right pattern (empty, r, or rw) wil.other: This right pattern (empty, r, or rw) will be applied at user creation for this workspace.

Try to use the current Pydio user creden.other: Try to use the current Pydio user credentials for connecting. Warning, the PYDIO_SESSION_SET_CREDENTIALS config must be set to true!

URI where to serve the public links.other: URI where to serve the public links

Use Pydio framework via the command line.other: Use Pydio framework via the command line, allowing CRONTAB jobs or background actions.

User name - Can be overriden on a per-us.other: User name - Can be overriden on a per-user basis (see users 'Personal Data' tab)

User password - Can be overriden on a pe.other: User password - Can be overriden on a per-user basis.

When a folder will contain more items th.other: When a folder will contain more items than this number, display will switch to pagination mode, for better performances.

When set to true, the user object is cre.other: When set to true, the user object is created automatically if the authentication succeed. Used by remote authentication systems.

Whether the password will be transmitted.other: Whether the password will be transmitted clear or encoded between the client and the server

Whether to show the recycle bin folder..other: Whether to show the recycle bin folder. Unlike in the following options, the folder will be hidden but still writeable.

Your application title.other: This title will appear as the window title, in the splash screen.

Do not display workspaces and cells sepa.other: Do not display workspaces and cells separately
